content: *this little dachshund is a sweet toy for any child lion brand yarn * skill level easy published in michael s create 2 colors 1 ball each vanna s choice® article #860 or wool-ease® article #620 crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm split ring stitch markers large eyed blunt needle 2 plastic safety eyes 9 mm diameter fiberfill stuffing exact gauge is not essential to this project worked in continuous rounds some construction required to finish available in different versions 81014ad 1 2005 vanna s choice® article #860 *chocolate & espresso* 70579ad 2 2005 wool-ease® article #620 *cocoa & chocolate brown* 1 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/81014ad html 2 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/70579ad html
